com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.gui.text
Class TextView

java.lang.Object
  org.fenggui.Widget
      org.fenggui.StandardWidget
          org.fenggui.ObservableWidget
              com.sun.darkstar.example.snowman.game.gui.text.TextView
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.fenggui.ITextWidget, org.fenggui.IWidget, org.fenggui.theme.xml.IXMLStreamable
public class TextView
extends org.fenggui.ObservableWidget
implements org.fenggui.ITextWidget

TextView defines a text display area which displays the text added to it with specified TextStyle. The texts which are displayed will fade out if there is no new texts are added in 10 seconds.

Version:
Creation date: 11-06-2008 18:54 EST, Modified date: 11-11-2008 17:39 EST
Author:
Yi Wang (Neakor)
